topic.title: XSL FO-based DITA to PDF Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output. includes a built-in DITA Map PDF - based on XSL-FO transformation scenario that converts DITA maps to PDF using an xsl:fo processor.

There are several methods that can be used to customize DITA to PDF output:
Create a customization directory that contains your customized files and reference that directory in the PDF transformation scenario (using the customization.dir parameter).
Creating a DITA Open Toolkit plugin that adds extensions to the PDF output. More details can be found in the DITA Open Toolkit Documentation.Some sample plugins are available on GitHub that could help you to get started with creating a plugin:
Sample Plugin: DITA-OT PDF Customization Plugin for Oxygen User Manual
Sample Plugin: DITA-OT PDF2 - Generate Numbers Before Topic's Title
